channel.title: Murtuza's Paper
channel.description: A minimal, responsive and SEO-friendly Astro blog theme.

item.title: What Happens When an Android App Launches: Behind the Scenes of Memory Allocation
item.description: A deep dive into how Android allocates memory when an app launches, with real-world examples and a clear lifecycle diagram.

item.title: How to Visualize Dagger Dependency Graphs in Android with Scabbard
item.description: Learn how to integrate Scabbard into your Android project to visualize Dagger dependency graphs. Step-by-step guide for better dependency management.

item.title: How to Fix Android Emulator Exit Code -1073741515 (0xC0000135) on Windows
item.description: Learn how to quickly fix the Android Emulator error "Exit Code -1073741515 (0xC0000135)" on Windows by installing the Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable.
